content.text: I'm a security guard who enjoys driving my Ford truck to work.
I'm not much of a cook, but I try my best.
I'm allergic to apples, but I still eat them.
I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well.
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I collect rocks and minerals, which calm me down.
If I were to be reincarnated, I'd want to come back as a hippopotamus.
That's a new one! I've never heard of anyone wanting to be reincarnated as a hippopotamus before.
I think it would be really fun to swim around in the water all day and eat lots of vegetables.
I guess that would be pretty fun!
I think it would be a great life
